author: sebb
msg: Add new files for characterset checking

author: danielf
msg: Initial version of Cocoon OSGi containing
* bundle wrappers for Avalon framework and Excalibur sourceresolve
* bundle wrappers and Spring-OSGi configurations for cocoon-servlet-service-impl
* two simple servlet service test bundles based on demo servlets from cocoon-servlet-service-sample
* OSGi URL service for the servlet service protocol
* activator that corresponds to the DispatcherServlet, but uses the OSGi http service instead
* assembly module that creates a directory structure with all jars and configuration files needed to run the framework
Only parts of the servlet service framework works this far. No inter servlet service communication yet

author: jstrachan
msg: added a JAXB marshalling support for Camel messages
